meanings.definition: To shock or overwhelm someone with surprise or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: The magician's trick stuns the audience.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog act stuns the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness stuns me every time.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display stuns with its brilliance.

meanings.definition: To render someone unconscious or immobile.
meanings.sent1: The knockout punch stuns the boxer.
meanings.sent2: The tranquilizer dart stuns the wild animal.
meanings.sent3: The sleep-inducing lullaby stuns the baby into dreamland.
meanings.sent4: The stunning blow stuns him into silence.
meanings.sent5: The anesthesia stuns the patient before surgery.

meanings.definition: To impress or amaze someone with great skill or beauty.
meanings.sent1: Her piano performance stuns the audience.
meanings.sent2: The intricate artwork stuns the critics.
meanings.sent3: The chef's culinary masterpiece stuns the food critics.
meanings.sent4: The breathtaking view from the mountaintop stuns hikers.
meanings.sent5: The acrobat's performance stuns with its agility.
